title: GetSentenceFromStart (Method)
text:
METHOD GetSentenceFromStart : POINTER TO SMC_GSentence
Returns a pointer to the n-th sentence, or 0 if the queue has less than n+1 elements.
The pointer is valid until the next call to RemoveFirst.
Only to be called safely from the reading thread, or when it is made sure that
no elements are removed concurrently.
